logger.doc:name: start log
logger.message: transactionId: #[vars.transactionId], correlationId: #[vars.correlationId], message: "Before insert case database call", payload: #[payload]

db:insert.doc:name: Insert Covid Case Master
db:insert.db:sql: insert into cvd_case_master(source, case_type, first_name, last_name, phone, email, date_of_birth, national_id, national_id_type, street_address, city, state, postal, country, create_date, update_date, create_by, update_by) values(:source, :case_type, :first_name, :last_name, :phone, :email, DATE_FORMAT(:date_of_birth, "%Y-%m-%d"), :national_id, :national_id_type, :street_address, :city, :state, :postal, :country, DATE_FORMAT(:create_date, "%Y-%m-%d"),DATE_FORMAT(:update_date, "%Y-%m-%d"), :create_by, :update_by)

logger.doc:name: end log
logger.message: transactionId: #[vars.transactionId], correlationId: #[vars.correlationId], message: "Completed insert case database call"
